DOC.brief_summary: This is a safety study of the Rapid System for acute ischemic stroke.
DOC.brief_title: Safety Study of the Rapid System for Acute Ischemic Stroke
DOC.criteria: Patients ≥18 to <85 years old Pre stroke modified Rankin Scale (mRS) of ≤2 A signed informed consent by patient or a legally acceptable representative Prestroke life expectancy of less than 6 months Current participation in another investigational drug or device study Pregnancy
